Please forward related profiles to praveen.k@kksoftwareassociates.com or +1 214-429-3482.Note: Please Don’t share F1, OPT, OPT EAD, L2 EAD and H4 EAD work permit profile and please forward the related profiles with exp 10+ Please share only Lead profiles Role: Dot Net Tech LeadLocation: Tampa, FLJD:10+ years experience, ASP .NET, Reactor Angular(preferred), SQL, Mongo DB• Leading and managing a team of .NET developers, assigning tasks and providing guidance and support.Collaborating with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements, and translating them into technical specifications.Designing and architecting scalable and robust software solutions using the .NET framework.Developing and coding software applications using C#, ASP.NET, and other .NET technologies.Conducting code reviews and ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.Troubleshooting and debugging complex software issues, and implementing effective solutions.Collaborating with cross-functional teams, such as quality assurance, to ensure software quality and performance.Keeping up-to-date with the latest .NET technologies, trends, and best practices, and recommending their adoption where applicable.Mentoring and coaching junior developers, providing technical guidance and fostering their professional growth.Assisting in project planning, estimation, and risk management activities.Thanks / RegardsPraveenContact:- +1 214 4293 482Whatsapp:- +1 214 4293 482Email: Praveen.k@kksoftwareassociates.comLinked In ID : https://www.linkedin.com/in/praveen-kanthri-160275167/
